The Bouncer

Ano: 2018

IMDb ID: tt7816392

Classificação: 5.9

Sinopse: The hero independently raises his little daughter and works as a security guard in a nightclub. Work is simple, enough to live. At night, he is on duty, and during the day he can communicate with the girl, because he loves her so much. Once in a bar, a terrible fight takes place, the hero has to intervene, but the consequences were sad. As a result, he finds himself in a police station, and then he is sentenced to prison.—Peter-Patrick76 (peter-patrick@mail.com)
